  • Method Details

    • write

      void write(PrintWriter writer, int code, String message, String requestURI, String servletName, Throwable cause, boolean withStackTrace, boolean withServletName, org.attribyte.api.Logger logger)
      Write the message.
      Parameters:
      writer - The output writer.
      code - The error code.
      message - The message.
      requestURI - The request URI.
      servletName - The servlet name.
      cause - The cause. May be null.
      withStackTrace - Should the stack trace be included?
      withServletName - Should the servlet name be included?
      logger - A logger. May be null;

    • send

      default void send(org.eclipse.jetty.server.Request request, int code, String message, boolean withStackTrace, org.attribyte.api.Logger logger, org.eclipse.jetty.server.Response response, org.eclipse.jetty.util.Callback callback) throws IOException
      Send an error response.
      Parameters:
      request - The request.
      code - The code.
      message - The message.
      withStackTrace - Should a stack trace be included in the output?
      logger - A logger.
      response - The response.
      callback - The callback.
      Throws:
      IOException - on write error.
